org.hypknowsys.wumprep.config
Class WUMprepConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.hypknowsys.wumprep.config.WUMprepConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WUMprepConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The main interface for handling WUMprep configuration files.

Nested Class Summary
private static class WUMprepConfiguration.ElementType
          Indicators standing for the several sections that a WUMprep configuration file is comprised of.

getSection

public WUMprepConfigSection getSection(java.lang.String sectionName)
Returns an entire section from the WUMprep configuration file.

Parameters:
sectionName - Name of the section to retrieve
Returns:
The section sectionName if it exists, else null.

getSections

public java.util.Vector<WUMprepConfigSection> getSections()
Getter of the property sections

Returns:
Returns the sections.

setEditSections

public void setEditSections(java.lang.String editSections)
Flag for signaling an editor interface that only certain sections of the configuration should be presented to the user for modification. Set this to null if the whole configuration might be edited. If you want multiple, but not all sections to be available in the editor, separate the section names by ':'.

Parameters:
editSections - The section(s) to be available in an editor interface.

setFilePath

public void setFilePath(java.lang.String uri)
Setter of the property uri

Parameters:
uri - The filePath to set.

setHeader

public void setHeader(java.lang.String headerText)
Sets the configuration file header text.

Parameters:
headerText - The text to set as the WUMprep configuration file header.

setHeader

public void setHeader(WUMprepConfigComment header)
Setter of the property header

Parameters:
header - The configHeader to set.

setSection

public void setSection(WUMprepConfigSection section)
Updates the given section. If section is not already part of the configuration, nothing happens.

Parameters:
section - The section to update

setSections

public void setSections(java.util.Vector<WUMprepConfigSection> sections)
Setter of the property sections

Parameters:
sections - The sections to set.

toFile

public void toFile(java.lang.String filename)
Saves itself into a file that can be loaded again with the WUMprepConfiguration(File) constructor at a later time.

Parameters:
filename - The filename to save this configuration as.
